MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the CW9 and WA5 postcode areas of Northwich and Great Sankey, which has been caused by the impact of flooding  due to Storm Christoph. Engineers are currently assessing the damage and working closely with the Environment Agency. As soon as it is safe to commence repairs, we will make every effort to restore supplies and hope to do so by 2pm today. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11:15 am on 22nd January 2021.
